mapper.update: update api_report set api_path = #{apiPath}, header_param = #{headerParam}, webform_param = #{webformParam}, body_param = #{bodyParam}, rely_value = #{relyValue}, expect_status = #{expectStatus}, act_status = #{actStatus}, response = #{response}, result_status = #{resultStatus}, api_method = #{apiMethod}, device = #{device}, device_type = #{deviceType}, response_base_expect_result = #{responseBaseExpectResult}, response_value_expect_result = #{responseValueExpectResult}, result_main = #{resultMain} where report_id = #{reportId} and test_id = #{testId}
mapper.select: select c.device as device, d.id as testId, c.api_path as apiPath, d.api_case_mark as apiCaseMark, d.act_status as actStatus, d.report_id as reportId, d.aid as id, d.result_main as resultMain, d.device_type as deviceType from uri c, (select a.report_id as report_id, b.api_id as api_id, b.id as id, a.act_status as act_status, b.api_case_mark as api_case_mark, a.id as aid, a.result_main as result_main, b.device_type as device_type from api_report a, apicase b where a.test_id = b.id) d where c.id = d.api_id and d.report_id = #{reportId}
